Game.Name: Ultimate Arcade Games (USA)
Game.plot: Ultimate Arcade Games is a collection of 12 arcade-style games, inspired by a variety of popular classics. Each game utilizes core gameplay ideas from classic arcade games, while expanding and improving each game for a new generation of gamers.The games include:1. Asteroid Mine2. BeeKeeper3. ChipBot4. FlipSide5. Galaxy Hero6. Gridlock7. Highway 518. Merchant Galactic9. Milk Run10. Omega Force11. Rubes Cubes12. Treasure HunterPlaying each game earns the player coins, which are used at the shop to purchase additional games and challenges. There are 120 challenges available to test the player's skills, and more than 340 medals to be earned. There is a high score board for each game, and players are able to view detailed statistics about time played, games played, medals won, and overall completion percentage.Cheat: Unlock all challengesEnter at the main menuCheat: Unlock all challengesEnter at the main menu
Game.Notes: A compilation of arcade-style games titles, based on the GBA line of Ultimate games from Telegames and Nocturnal Entertainment. Featured games are: ThunderBlade, Galaxy Hero, FlipSide, ChipBot, Merchant Galactic, MilkRun, GridLock, Rubes Cubes, BeeKeeper, Asteroid Mine, Highway 51 and Treasure Hunter.
